message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have the remaining 10%.  Let's see how this works out for us!
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the clock is ticking and the money is losing value.
Okay, Bob, let's be a little more reasonable.  I'll take 55% and you can have 45%.  This is a fair compromise, and it's getting risky for both of us to keep going.
Alice, the sands of time are eroding the value of this deal!  I'll take the 55% you offered last round, but now it's my turn.  Don't let inflation eat away at our potential winnings any further!
